content: गंडकः [गंड स्वार्थे क] {@--1@} A rhinoceros. {@--2@} An impediment, obstacle. {@--3@} A joint, knot. {@--4@} A mark, spot. {@--5@} A boil, tumour, pimple. {@--6@} Disjunction, separation. {@--7@} A coin of the value of four cowries. {@--8@} A mode of reckoning by fours. {@--9@} Astrological science.
